label: clinical_signal_03_dx_renal_biomarker_study_013
content:

### Events
- Renal ultrasound images uploaded to central imaging core
- Drug supply reconciliation completed at 56 sites

### Notes
- Week 13: Renal biomarker collection on schedule. 85 subjects enrolled across 4 cohorts. eGFR and urinary biomarkers within expected variability.
